official_title: A bill to extend until the close of June 30, 1984 the existing suspension of duties on certain metal waste and scrap, unwrought metal, and for other articles of metal.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to extend until June 30, 1984, the existing suspension of duties on certain metal waste and scrap, unwrought metal, and other metal articles.

titles.title: A bill to extend until the close of June 30, 1984 the existing suspension of duties on certain metal waste and scrap, unwrought metal, and for other articles of metal.
